featured.text: the sweet smell from the bakery, so I walked in and bought a fresh loaf of bread.

definition.zh_def: 烘焙店，專門製作和銷售麵包、糕點和其他烘焙食品的商店。
definition.en_def: A place where bread, pastries, and other baked goods are made and sold.
definition.example: I bought a fresh loaf of bread from the bakery this morning.
